name: Ortlieb Trunk-Bag
description:
Add this trunk rack to your pannier setup on long tours or quick jaunts. The waterproof fabric and roll-top closure keeps your gear dry on wet commutes and the inevitable rainy days you'll ride through on a bike tour.PU-laminated nylon is completely waterproof.IP64 waterproof rating stays dry in rainy weather.Roll-top closure doubles as carry handle.Inner zippered pocket with key clip.Top-Lock adapter fits most racks with a 80-160mm rectangular base.Shoulder strap for carrying comfort off the rack.Mount for optional rear light (sold separately).Max load is 10kg.

        Sustainability






.cls-1,.cls-3{fill:none;}.cls-2{clip-path:url(#clip-path);}.cls-3{stroke:#333;stroke-width:2.28px;}.cls-4{fill:#333;}
